DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to estimate the proportion of children, born between the 06/04/2004 and the 17/004/2008, living around Neufchatel en Bray, vaccinated by MenBVac, with a serum bactericidal activity against B:14,P1-7,16 clone related to a protection (>= 4), before the fourth dose of MenBvac and after: 6 weeks and one year after the fourth dose.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Immune Response Against the Strain of Neisseria Meningitidis B: 14, P1-7, 16 in Patients Having to be Vaccinated MenBVac® (Extension EFFIVAC)
DOC.criteria: children born between 06/04/2004 and 17/04/2008, living in Neufchatel en Bray,and Having participated to the first study, children who Have to be Vaccinated MenBVac® for the four times, parental authority(ies)assent. no parental authority(ies)assent, no blood sample, impossibility of fourth vaccination, children yet vaccinated or non eligible for vaccination.
